sentences.en: A fiery steed is not trained in a courtyard, nor does a pine grow sturdy in a greenhouse.
sentences.cn: 院子里练不出千里马, 温室里长不出万年松.

sentences.en: a sturdy pair of boots
sentences.cn: 一双结实的靴子

sentences.en: a sturdy young man
sentences.cn: 健壮的小伙子

sentences.en: As one kind of building materials, wood is inadequately sturdy.
sentences.cn: 作为一种建筑材料, 木材不够结实.

sentences.en: Children need sturdy shoes.
sentences.cn: 孩子们需要结实的鞋子.

sentences.en: Grease two sturdy baking sheets and heat the oven to 400 degrees.
sentences.cn: 在两块结实的烤板上抹些油，把烤炉加热到400度。

sentences.en: He is a sturdy boy. He hardly ever gets ill.
sentences.cn: 这孩子皮实,轻易不闹病.

sentences.en: He is sturdy and so fit for the job.
sentences.cn: 他很健壮,所以适合担任这个工作.

sentences.en: He's a very sturdy child and very healthy.
sentences.cn: 他是个壮实的孩子,长的很健康.

sentences.en: His sturdy mother quickly stepped forward to take hold of his hand.
sentences.cn: 他那好强的母亲忙不迭地走上前去,一把拽住了他的手.

sentences.en: Look for a suit made from good, sturdy cloth to ensure it hangs well.
sentences.cn: 找一套用结实的好布料做的套装，这样的衣服垂感好。

sentences.en: sturdy comfortable shoes
sentences.cn: 结实而舒适的鞋子

sentences.en: Sturdy grass withstands high wind ; true gold stands the test of fire.
sentences.cn: 疾风知劲草,烈火见真金.

sentences.en: sturdy legs
sentences.cn: 结实的双腿

sentences.en: Sturdy steeds gallop on the grasslands.
sentences.cn: 骏马在草原上奔驰.

sentences.en: That chair doesn’t look very sturdy.
sentences.cn: 那把椅子看上去不太结实。

sentences.en: The leather is supple and sturdy enough to last for years.
sentences.cn: 该皮革柔软而结实，足以用上数年。

sentences.en: There was a sturdy plumpness about her hips.
sentences.cn: 她的臀部浑圆结实。

sentences.en: They kept up a sturdy opposition to the plan.
sentences.cn: 他们一直坚决反对那项计划。

sentences.en: We need several sturdy men to push this car.
sentences.cn: 我们需要几个壮汉推这辆车.

trans.tran_cn: 强壮的，健全的，坚固的，耐用的，坚定的，精力充沛的
trans.tran_en: (of an object) strong and not easily damaged
